markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2847)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=586" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Electric arcs crisscross _shock_ weapons, dealing an extra 1d6 electricity damage on a hit. On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the target.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Shock
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Shock (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Electricity damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's electricity resistance (and the other creatures' on a critical hit).
name: Shock (Greater)
